_sText:
<font face=verdana size=3 color=red>THIS IS AN OUTDATED VERSION! Version TWO has been released!</font>

Surf_machine_remix by Paper-Cut

_________________________________________________


Installation: Drag folder into cstrike.

_________________________________________________


Permission to make this rebuild was received from Z-machine. 

_________________________________________________

Credits: 
Z-machine for the original map
Paper-Cut, remix version

_________________________________________________


Version 1 Changes:

Textures redone EVERYWHERE
Added jail release/kill mechanism
Fixed several various ramp problems
Added push out of spawn teleports to avoid camping
Propped guns against wall at top to avoid gun nading
Added 2 scouts at cone
Redid all the arches
Fixed several various texture glitches
Added shotguns near cone push
Extended the fence at spawn
Moved the awps on the middle ramp to a higher platform
Added a few secrets, :D
Fixed doors before the loop
Changed the loop a little to make it more smooth
Added environmental lighting
Redid the ramps to cone area
Redid the gun room to the far right
Added an anti-camping incentive near the T spawn teleport
Fixed the ramps at jail so they are now surfable both ways
Added teleport indicators

_________________________________________________


Big thanks goes out to:

Solid Surf, for your great community, tutorials, help and resources
Etrigan, for testing virtually every beta that I put out for this.
SintaxError, for providing me with various help, and with his invisible water texture
Aes, for showing me that surfing gods really do exist.

_________________________________________________


Happy surfing!
